updateOutcomeFavourPlayer((address,bytes.details: Take an old outcome and update it to favour a given player       Assumes the outcome allocations can be indexed by the playerIndex

params.outcome: An outcome object to be rebalanced
params.playerIndex: Zero based index of the player to be assigned the favoured outcome

returns._0: The outcome resulting in a rebalance to the given player
